title: Don't Try To Eat This Speaker...
description: Honeycomb Wireless Speaker (USA Link) -  Honeycomb Wireless Speaker (International) -   One of the more unusual wireless bluetooth speakers to ever be featured on Unbox Therapy.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
